summary: This document is a certification from Wolf Camera responding to a federal grand jury subpoena (OLY-77), attesting to the authenticity of business records provided. It includes a receipt from 2005 for a purchase made by Jeffrey Epstein at a Wolf Camera store in Atlanta, Georgia, and a customer profile screen for Epstein from 2007.

persons.name: Ritz-CodYnera bc
persons.context: The undersigned employee of Wolf Camera who certifies the attached business records are authentic and responsive to the grand jury subpoena.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the cardholder on a 2005 Wolf Camera receipt from The Gardens store in Atlanta, and as a 'Frequent Foto Customer' in a 2007 profile screen.

connections.description: The Wolf Camera employee certifies business records that include a transaction receipt for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein purchase at Wolf Camera
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein made a purchase at Wolf Camera store 'The Gardens' in Atlanta, Georgia, totaling $46.84.

events.title: Certification for Grand Jury Subpoena
events.description: A Wolf Camera employee executes a certification declaring attached records are authentic and responsive to Federal Grand Jury Subpoena OLY-77.

locations: The Gardens (Wolf Camera store), 1392 IL 8632, Atlanta, GA 30339
keyFacts: Wolf Camera was served with a Federal Grand Jury Subpoena (OLY-77) as part of an investigation.
The responsive records include a 2005 sales receipt showing Jeffrey Epstein made a purchase at a Wolf Camera store in Atlanta.
A 2007 customer profile screen for Jeffrey Epstein shows him enrolled in the 'Frequent Foto' program with a Wolf Camera account.
The document demonstrates law enforcement gathering financial/business records related to Jeffrey Epstein in 2007.
